knimeNode.name: Formula Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Saves growth/survival/inactivation models to a database

fullDescription.intro: Saves primary or secondary models. This can either be the internal database or any HSQL database with the appropriate data structure.
fullDescription.option: By default the internal database is accessed. This can be accessed and edited by clicking "PmmLab" -> "Open DB Gui...". In order to use an external database, check the box and choose another HSQL database. If necessary, a login and a password can also be entered. Please note: In order to be able to read the stored data the database should be structured in the same way as the internal database.

ports.inPort: A table containing the model formula and additional information.
